DESCRIPTION: Burns a multitude of cards at once
IN_ACTIVE_MB: {{user}} You already have a massburn ongoing
PROVIDE_FILTERS: Provide the filters you want to apply to the burn process! `t=<TagName>, g><=gen, wl><=wishlist`
WRONG_TAG: {{author}} The `Tag` name you provided is invalid
NO_CARDS_FOUND: {{author}} You do not have any cards in your collection yet
CONFIRM_ASK: Are you sure you want to burn the above cards? This process is irreversible
MISSING_CARDS: {{author}} At least one of the cards from your selected `Tags` is no longer in your collection
CANCELLED: {{author}} You dont have enough `{{currency}}` for this process
